entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
